channel.title: Hui Chen on 苏命 | Ming Su

item.title: MIB-producing cyanobacteria (Planktothrix sp.) in a drinking water reservoir: Distribution and odor producing potential
item.description: Highlights Water level lowering triggered the deep living cyanobacteria bloom in Miyun Reservoir. The shallow areas in Miyun Reservoir are the major habitats for Planktothrix sp. The Planktothrix could bloom in mesotrophic water due to its low light requirement.
